title: County, city, financial offices, schools closed Monday
text: County, city, financial offices, schools closed Monday Comment Posted Oct. 8, 2015 at 4:08 PM Updated at 4:11 PM Posted Oct. 8, 2015 at 4:08 PM Updated at 4:11 PM » Social News Monday is Columbus Day and many places will be closed in observance. The following will be closed or not in service Monday: — banks; — municipal offices including Adelanto, Apple Valley, Barstow, Hesperia and Victorville; — county offices; — libraries; — schools. The Daily Press offices will be open during normal business hours, the local transit system will have buses running and trash pickup service will run as usual on Monday.
